page.title: 10A LEONS BUS DRIVERS DAY
page.content: "I usually get up at 6.00am and I'm at work by 7.45am. My first job is{school { contract}work, starting at Doncaster and travel through the villages to Auckley. After this I go back to the garage and start{cleaning}the buses, washing outside and vacuuming the inside. Any mechanical jobs are done by the mechanics. At lunchtime I'm on school runs again and at present am out every lunchtime. After my lunch I finish off the cleaning then at about 3.45pm its back onto school contracts. This is a basic day, others might include an{excursion}to Scarbourgh or Derbyshire anywhere really. I don't usually find out until about 4.00pm what I'm doing the next day except for Bank Holidays when I know in advance. Normally I can be{out}of the garage from{9.00am-9.00pm}but on excursion it can be more".
